title: Adguard for Mac (v1.2.0) [Mac OS X] [Multi] (2016)
description:
Program name: Adguard
Program Type: Anti-Banner, Web Filter, Anti-Phishing and etc.
Version: 1.2.0
Release date: February 15, 2016
Language: English, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Korean, and etc.
Operating system: OS X
File size: 46 Mb
----------------------------------------------------
Description:
Adguard - is one of a kind of full ad blocker for Mac OS X. It is a universal program that contains all the necessary options for the most comfortable using the Internet. Ad Blockers, warning or blocking phishing and other online threats and protection of your personal data on the Internet.
Adguard able to block advertising absolutely in any application. In contradistinction to other existing solutions for Internet filtering, Adguard was created specifically for the Mac, which allows you to block advertising are not only in browsers, but also in the applications installed on your device.
----------------------------------------------------
Advantages of the program:
1. Works in all popular browsers;
2. Designed to block all types of advertising;
3. Easy to use, blocks ads insensibly in the background mode;
4. Warns about the danger during the transition to suspicious websites;
5. Has the module (Assistant Adguard) to manage the program directly from your browser;
6. Prevents from counters and systems analysts, prohibits tracking user activity online.
----------------------------------------------------
System requirements:
Operating System: OS X 10.7 and beyond
Browsers: Any (Safari, Google Chrome, Opera, Firefox etc.)
Disk: 100 Mb free hard disk space.
----------------------------------------------------
What's new in version 1.2.0?
1. [Added] New localizations: Serbian (Latin), German, Italian, Spanish, Chinese Traditional, Armenian, Turkish, Korean, Indonesian, Hungarian.
2. [Added] User warnings in case HTTP proxy mode fails to start.
3. [Changed] Assistant requests are now excluded from "Filtering log".
4. [Changed] Now clicking on Adguard icon in status bar brings opened Adguard windows to front and makes them active.
5. [Fixed] Error previously led to inability to change HTTP proxy port with HTTP proxy mode enabled.
6. [Fixed] Lack of explanation text in the 'Enter email address' text field.
7. [Added] $genericblock rule modifier.
8. [Added] $generichide rule modifier.
9. [Added] $replace modifier for basic rules.
10. [Changed] Now $popup rules modifier is also applied to server redirect responses.
11. [Changed] Now status 500 is always returned for blocked requests.
12. [Changed] User filter is now loaded last, after all other filters are loaded.
13. [Fixed] Error in css-inject rules.
14. [Fixed] Error in finding the elements path on a page for HTML filtering rules.
15. [Fixed] Error in HTML filtering rules â€“ previously empty elements were never removed.
16. [Fixed] Improved processing of rules with $popup modifier.
17. [Fixed] Modifiers for the whitelist rules now work while filtering content.
18. [Fixed] Now $elemhide rule modifier is applied only to HTML pages.
19. [Fixed] Problem with basic rules being treated as rules with $popup modifier.
20. [Fixed] Third-party requests filtering error.

and etc
